main event: A UFO sighting involving a flat disc-shaped object with brilliant lights over Cape Neddick, Maine on 12 April 1968.
interesting points: The object was spotted by observers during a moon eclipse,The object had a white pulsating light and red blinking lights,It moved from South to Northeast and hovered at about 600 feet above ground,The sighting lasted for about one minute and was reported to be possibly an aircraft,There were no other reported sightings to local authorities despite many people being outside.
sighted object: flat disc-shaped object with a dome and lights
witness description: Retired teacher with a lifelong interest in space and aerospace matters.
